DOC.brief_summary: Open-vent jet nebulizer frequently use promote drug lung deposition clinical efficacy indication clear . Our study aim compare inhaled mass , lung deposition amikacin use jet nebulizer ( Sidestream ) two different configuration : vent unvented coupled 110 ml corrugate piece tubing .
DOC.brief_title: Study Aerosol Deposition With Vented Unvented Jet Nebulizer Healthy Subjets
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers 18 60 year old Smokers Pathological spirometry History treatment aminoglygosides 1 month prior study Known allergy aminoglycosydes Any lung pathology history lung surgery
